title: Riot pls help me
body: I bought zac's skin pool party and I checked and I don't have it pls help me

replies.body: I'm seeing quite a lot of EU store issues lately, so in order to track and get this fixed for everyone as quickly as possible I'm asking that we start submitting [**tickets**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you've had any issues with the EU store.
